description: You are given an unrooted weighted tree with n vertices representing servers numbered from 0 to n - 1, an array edges where edges[i] = [ai, bi, weighti] represents a bidirectional edge between vertices ai and bi of weight weighti. You are also given an integer signalSpeed. Two servers a and b are connectable through a server c if: Return an integer array count of length n where count[i] is the number of server pairs that are connectable through the server i.
